mapper.select: SELECT rh.receive_no, rh.asn_bill_no, rh.bill_state, rh.wh_code, rh.owner_code, rh.bill_type_cd, wbt.bill_type_name, rh.in_store_type, rh.asn_bill_no, rh.supplier_code, rh.supplier_name, rh.remark from receive_header rh, wms_bill_type wbt where rh.bill_type_cd = wbt.bill_type_cd and receive_id = #{id}

select h.receive_id, h.receive_no, h.supplier_name, b.bill_type_name from receive_header h LEFT JOIN wms_bill_type b ON h.bill_type_cd = b.bill_type_cd
h.receive_no LIKE concat('%',#{query.no},'%') AND h.is_deleted=0 AND h.wh_id=#{query.whId} OR h.external_order_no LIKE concat('%',#{query.no},'%') AND h.wh_id=#{query.whId} AND h.is_deleted=0
group by h.receive_id,b.bill_type_name order by h.create_time
